description: Buttery, perfectly cooked scrambled eggs are a real treat and a sprinkling of chives makes them extra delicious.
keywords: Eggs on toast,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Creamy Scrambled Eggs with Chives Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Beat the eggs and cream together in a large bowl, season and stir in the chives.

Melt the butter in a large non-stick pan on medium low heat. Pour in the eggs, let them sit for 20 seconds, then fold gently. Leave to sit for 15 seconds and stir again with a wooden spoon. Continue until the eggs are cooked but still runny in parts.
Serve on buttered toast with extra chives on top, if desired.
